title: Big 1 bed on Comm Ave / No rental fee , Avail
map_address: Commonwealth Ave near Chestnut Hill Ave
posting_body: Cleveland Circle is a local hub of commerce, and transportation.
It sits at the intersection of Beacon Street, and Chestnut Hill Avenue with three of the Green Line routes within walking distance of the circle.

Reservoir station on the D line, Cleveland Circle station on the C line, and Chestnut Hill Avenue station allow quick access through Brighton, Brookline, Longwood medical area, and the rest of the train system.
The Circle its self is a popular, night life destination with Boston College students, because it offers some bars, banking, and fast food options.
However the side streets around Cleveland Circle are lightly trafficked, and quiet.
